result.name: compass-rose-marine-conservation-zone-mcz-survey-data
result.notes:
One survey of The Compass Rose rMCZ site has been completed to date (Apr 
2015): Cruise: Cefas_cend0412 Date: 2nd March 2012 - 4th March 2012 Data 
collected: MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): Transit Data and Limited 
Corridors Only MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): Transit Data and Limited 
Corridors Only SS Coverage : None acquired to date Video and Stills Samples to 
date: 19 video transects; 57 analysed (475 stills taken); (Cefas_cend0412) - 
Usable PSA Samples to date: 54 Infauna Samples to date: 54

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.
